title: Fast Soft Colour Segmentation
content: Neural network based method for segmenting images into separate layers specified by an input colour palette.
This approach achieves results comparable to state-of-the-art models but 300,000 times faster.
subtitle: Python, Scikit Learn, Numpy, Pytorch

title: Pong Agent with Deep Q-Learning
content: Deep Q-learning and double deep Q-learning algorithms to teach an agent to succeed in Pong.
Pong agent surpasses human average score difference by 10 point.
subtitle: Pytorch, OpenAI Gym, NumPy, pyglet, Matplotlib

title: Naive Bayes Spam Email ClassifieR
content: Spam email classifier using Naïve Bayes algorithm with an accuracy of 97.8%.
subtitle: Python, Scikit Learn, Numpy, Pandas

title: Exoplanet Habitability Classifier
content: Developed Naïve Bayes and Logistic Regression machine learning models to classify exoplanets as either potentially habitable or non-habitable.
Used combination of Pandas and Numpy to transform raw data from NASA's open exoplanet datasets into parsed dataframes.
subtitle: Python, Scikit Learn, Numpy, Pandas

title: Moodbuddy
content: Parsed users' journal entries using sentiment analysis API to allow for monitoring trends in mental health.
Allowed users to share entry data with mental healthcare practitioners to facilitate therapy sessions.
subtitle: React, Typescript, GraphQL, MongoDB
